argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnval.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | psgnval.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 3 |  | psgnval.n | |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( G gsum w ) = ( G gsum W ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( w = W -> ( ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum w ) <-> ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum W ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( W e. Word T /\ ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum W ) ) -> E. w e. Word T ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( W e. Word T -> E. w e. Word T ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum w ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_psgneldm2 | |- ( D e. V -> ( ( G gsum W ) e. dom N <-> E. w e. Word T ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum w ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( D e. V /\ E. w e. Word T ( G gsum W ) = ( G gsum w ) ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. dom N ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. dom N ) |
